childhood_psychiatric.name: Childhood Psychiatric
childhood_psychiatric.motive: Supporting children's emotional and behavioral development.

hero.title: Helping Children Thrive
hero.text: Children can face emotional and behavioral challenges that impact their development. Disorders like ADHD, autism spectrum disorder, and childhood anxiety can affect learning, socialization, and emotions.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Emotional and behavioral challenges, learning difficulties, socialization issues.

info_columns.title: Support Strategy
info_columns.content: Early diagnosis, behavioral therapy, structured routines, parental guidance, social skills training, family involvement, and school collaboration.

hero.title: Managing Anxiety
hero.text: Excessive worry, fear, and panic attacks can disrupt daily life. Anxiety disorders include generalized anxiety disorder, social anxiety, phobias, and panic disorder.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Excessive worry, restlessness, rapid heartbeat, panic attacks, avoidance behavior.

info_columns.title: Support Strategy
info_columns.content: Cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT), relaxation techniques, mindfulness, gradual exposure therapy, medications (if needed), and support groups.

sexual_disorders.name: Sexual Disorders
sexual_disorders.motive: Ensuring a healthy and fulfilling sex life.

hero.title: Addressing Sexual Health
hero.text: Sexual dysfunctions (e.g., low desire, erectile dysfunction) and paraphilic disorders (unconventional sexual interests causing distress) can affect relationships and well-being.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Low sexual desire, erectile dysfunction, unconventional sexual interests causing distress.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Treatment includes psychotherapy, Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, performance improvement exercises, medical treatments, and couples therapy to enhance communication and understanding.

info_columns.title: Support Strategy
info_columns.content: Compassionate therapy, sex counseling, medication (if required), addressing underlying psychological issues, and partner involvement.

psychotic_disorders.name: Psychotic Disorders
psychotic_disorders.motive: Helping individuals maintain stability and lead fulfilling lives.

hero.title: Living with Psychotic Disorders
hero.text: Conditions like schizophrenia and schizoaffective disorder cause hallucinations, delusions, and disorganized thinking.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Hallucinations, delusions, disorganized thinking, social withdrawal.

info_columns.title: Support Strategy
info_columns.content: Antipsychotic medications, psychotherapy, family support, social rehabilitation, and crisis intervention.

hero.title: Managing Mood Disorders
hero.text: Depression drains energy, while bipolar disorder causes mood swings between extreme highs and lows.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Persistent sadness, loss of interest, mood swings, fatigue, feelings of worthlessness.

info_columns.title: Support Strategy
info_columns.content: Personalized treatment including therapy (CBT, interpersonal therapy), mood stabilizers, antidepressants, lifestyle changes, and emotional support from loved ones.

addiction_disorders.name: Addiction Disorders
addiction_disorders.motive: Regaining control and building a fulfilling life.

hero.title: Overcoming Addiction
hero.text: Substance addictions (alcohol, drugs) and behavioral addictions (gambling, gaming, internet) hijack the brain’s reward system.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Craving, loss of control over substance use, withdrawal symptoms, neglect of responsibilities.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: We offer comprehensive programs that include psychotherapy, behavioral therapy, gradual detox plans, medication-assisted treatment when necessary, and techniques to enhance self-control.

info_columns.title: Support Strategy
info_columns.content: Detox programs, rehabilitation, cognitive therapy, support groups (AA, NA), family therapy, and relapse prevention strategies.

psychotherapy_services.name: Psychotherapy Services
psychotherapy_services.motive: 🚀 Free yourself from psychological suffering and start your journey of change today! 💙

hero.title: Psychotherapy
hero.text: Psychotherapy helps individuals understand their thoughts, emotions, and behaviors, leading to lasting change. Various approaches are tailored to meet individual needs.

info_columns.title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT)
info_columns.content: Restructures negative thought patterns to improve emotional well-being.

info_columns.title: Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT)
info_columns.content: Helps manage intense emotions, especially in personality disorders.

info_columns.title: Psychodynamic Therapy
info_columns.content: Explores past experiences to resolve deep emotional conflicts.

info_columns.title: Interpersonal Therapy (IPT)
info_columns.content: Enhances relationships and social functioning.

info_columns.title: Mindfulness-Based Therapy
info_columns.content: Promotes present-moment awareness to reduce stress and anxiety.

info_columns.title: Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT)
info_columns.content: Accept, let go, and start a meaningful life. It helps individuals deal with negative emotions and painful thoughts through acceptance rather than resistance, committing to personal values to build a fulfilling life.

info_columns.title: Spiritual Psychotherapy
info_columns.content: Spiritual psychotherapy is a holistic approach that integrates mental health and spirituality to achieve emotional balance, inner peace, and self-awareness. It relies on spiritual values, meditation, and psychological guidance to enhance inner strength and cope with life's challenges.

info_columns.title: Therapeutic Groups
info_columns.content: Therapeutic groups are an effective means of psychotherapy and emotional rehabilitation, where individuals facing similar challenges come together in a safe and supportive environment to share experiences, learn from others, and develop coping skills for psychological difficulties.

geriatric_psychiatric.name: geriatric psychiatric
geriatric_psychiatric.motive: Ensuring dignity, emotional well-being, and a high quality of life.

hero.title: Caring for the Elderly
hero.text: Aging brings mental health challenges like dementia, late-life depression, and anxiety.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Memory loss, confusion, disorientation, personality changes, impaired judgment.

info_columns.title: Support Strategy
info_columns.content: Gentle care, cognitive stimulation, medications, psychotherapy, social engagement, and family education.

marital_counseling.name: Marital Counseling
marital_counseling.motive: 🚀 Make your relationship a priority – Start your journey towards a happy and balanced marriage today! ❤️

hero.title: Strengthening Relationships
hero.text: Relationships face challenges that can lead to conflict, emotional distance, or dissatisfaction. Marital counseling provides a safe space to rebuild trust, enhance communication, and resolve conflicts.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Relationships face challenges that can lead to conflict, emotional distance, or dissatisfaction. Marital counseling provides a safe space to rebuild trust, enhance communication, and resolve conflicts.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: We offer specialized therapy sessions, techniques to improve communication, problem-solving strategies, and support for rebuilding trust and closeness.

info_columns.title: Support Strategy
info_columns.content: Couples therapy, communication skills training, conflict resolution techniques, and emotional bonding exercises.
